EmailTemplate.name: Notify Outfitter - Open 4hrs
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for reaching out to YETI! {!Case.Thread_Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for reaching out to YETI! We know you are busy out there and we are excited to hear from you! We are "all hands on deck" here at the moment, working to get to you as soon as possible. Hang tight and we will be in touch. Talk to you soon!
Information about our products and/or your order can be found on our FAQ page.
The YETI Outfitters YETI 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
{!Case.Thread_Id}
